job_title: English Language Assistant in La Serena
pros: Great opportunity, established scheme, great links
cons: Didn't get paid on time with the placement (not BC's fault)

pros:
I worked until 2007.
Great company, got promoted couple of times.
Best organizational culture IN THE WORLD!.
Collaboration, cooperation, excellence, great place to work.
cons: Due to the fact it is a government institution, you completely miss the commercial aspects of the companies. I do not recommend it for more than 8 years. It is like an unreal world.

pros: I worked with an amazing team of professionals, the job  and team communication was mostly online work, the team was very supportive and encouraging  with each other. Everybody was motivated and easy to work with.
cons: It was a project that unfortunately did not continue.

pros:
Great culture and good working athmosphere
Some travel
cons:
Salaries are below the market
Variance in leadership quality
